title: An Alien’s Guide to Earth
description: Jon Stewart is the first guest of the new season. He and Neil discuss the Daily Show book, Earth: A Visitor's Guide to the Human Race.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: Jon Stewart is the first guest of the new season. He and Neil discuss the Daily Show book, Earth: A Visitor's Guide to the Human Race.
